channel.title: middlegames on Ars Atomica
channel.description: Recent content in middlegames on Ars Atomica

item.title: Classic FICS: subtle space
item.description: This time, we’re looking at a FICS blitz game from 2008. One of the strongest atomic players, siggemannen, takes the black pieces against luckybbad in a 3 minute, no increment game. FICS database number: 214032815 View the complete game analysed on lichess. luckybbad (1934) - siggemannen (2306), 3+0, FICS 2008-11-02 1. e3 e6 2. Qf3 f5 3. Qh5+ g6 4. Qh4 White opts to trade queens early. This particular line might be criticised in some quarters as unambitious.
